name: Curve
description: Curve straddles tech and finance as an over the top banking platform, this allows it to accumulate the data that a traditional finance company would but without the regulation of a bank

H123.bullet3: 27% of new customers are choosing a paid card
H123.para: Aiming to be EBITDA positive before the end of 2023
